subject: Rodeos
Cowboys and Cowgirls
Horses
Cattle
lead_paragraph: Chilean rodeo, with major competitions from September through April, is based on the practical, real-life work that cowboys have to cull a steer from the herd.
snippet: Chilean rodeo, with major competitions from September through April, is based on the practical, real-life work that cowboys have to cull a steer from the herd.
